SELECT p."Id", p."Price", p."RecordingDate", p."GameId", g."Title" AS "GameName", p0."Name" AS "PlatformName"
FROM "PriceEntries" AS p
INNER JOIN "Games" AS g ON p."GameId" = g."Id"
INNER JOIN "Platforms" AS p0 ON p."PlatformId" = p0."Id"
WHERE p."GameId" = @__request_GameId_0
ORDER BY p."Id" DESC

SELECT p."Id", p."Price", p."RecordingDate", p."GameId", g."Title" AS "GameName", p0."Name" AS "PlatformName"
FROM "PriceEntries" AS p
INNER JOIN "Games" AS g ON p."GameId" = g."Id"
INNER JOIN "Platforms" AS p0 ON p."PlatformId" = p0."Id"
WHERE p."GameId" = @__request_GameId_0
ORDER BY p."Id" DESC

SELECT f."Id", f."Title", f."CreatedDate", u."Email" AS "Author", (
    SELECT count(*)::int
    FROM "ForumReplies" AS f0
    WHERE f."Id" = f0."ForumPostId") AS "CommentCount"
FROM "ForumPosts" AS f
INNER JOIN "Users" AS u ON f."UserId" = u."Id"
WHERE f."ForumCategoryId" = @__categoryId_0
ORDER BY f."CreatedDate" DESC

SELECT f."Id", f."Title", f."CreatedDate", u."Email" AS "Author", (
    SELECT count(*)::int
    FROM "ForumReplies" AS f0
    WHERE f."Id" = f0."ForumPostId") AS "CommentCount"
FROM "ForumPosts" AS f
INNER JOIN "Users" AS u ON f."UserId" = u."Id"
WHERE f."ForumCategoryId" = @__categoryId_0
ORDER BY f."CreatedDate" DESC

    SELECT count(*)::int
    FROM "ForumReplies" AS f0
    WHERE f."Id" = f0."ForumPostId") AS "CommentCount"

INNER JOIN "Users" AS u ON f."UserId" = u."Id"

SELECT f."Id", f."Title", f."CreatedDate", u."Email" AS "Author", (
    SELECT count(*)::int
    FROM "ForumReplies" AS f0
    WHERE f."Id" = f0."ForumPostId") AS "CommentCount"
FROM "ForumPosts" AS f
INNER JOIN "Users" AS u ON f."UserId" = u."Id"
WHERE f."ForumCategoryId" = @__categoryId_0
ORDER BY f."CreatedDate" DESC

    SELECT count(*)::int
    FROM "ForumReplies" AS f0
    WHERE f."Id" = f0."ForumPostId") AS "CommentCount"

SELECT f."Id", f."Title", f."CreatedDate", u."Email" AS "Author", (
    SELECT count(*)::int
    FROM "ForumReplies" AS f0
    WHERE f."Id" = f0."ForumPostId") AS "CommentCount"
FROM "ForumPosts" AS f
INNER JOIN "Users" AS u ON f."UserId" = u."Id"
WHERE f."CategoryId" = @__categoryId_0
ORDER BY f."CreatedDate" DESC

SELECT f."Id", f."Title", f."CreatedDate", u."Email" AS "Author", (
    SELECT count(*)::int
    FROM "ForumReplies" AS f0
    WHERE f."Id" = f0."ForumPostId") AS "CommentCount"

SELECT f.id AS "Id", f.title AS "Title", f.createddate AS "CreatedDate", u."Email" AS "Author", (
    SELECT count(*)::int
    FROM "ForumReplies" AS f0
    WHERE f.id = f0."ForumPostId") AS "CommentCount"
FROM "ForumPosts" AS f
INNER JOIN "Users" AS u ON f.userid = u."Id"
WHERE f.forumcategoryid = @__categoryId_0
ORDER BY f.createddate DESC

SELECT f.id AS "Id", f.title AS "Title", f.createddate AS "CreatedDate", u."Email" AS "Author", (
    SELECT count(*)::int
    FROM "ForumReplies" AS f0
    WHERE f.id = f0."ForumPostId") AS "CommentCount"
FROM "ForumPosts" AS f

WHERE f.forumcategoryid = @__categoryId_0
ORDER BY f.createddate DESC

2025-12-30 01:53:54.321 +03:00 [ERR] Failed executing DbCommand (5ms) [Parameters=[@__categoryId_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT f.id AS "Id", f.title AS "Title", f.createddate AS "CreatedDate", u."Email" AS "Author", (
    SELECT count(*)::int
    FROM "ForumReplies" AS f0
    WHERE f.id = f0."ForumPostId") AS "CommentCount"
FROM "ForumPosts" AS f
INNER JOIN "Users" AS u ON f.userid = u."Id"
WHERE f.forumcategoryid = @__categoryId_0
ORDER BY f.createddate DESC

SELECT p."Id", p."Price", p."RecordingDate", p."GameId", g."Title" AS "GameName", p0."Name" AS "PlatformName"
FROM "PriceEntries" AS p
INNER JOIN "Games" AS g ON p."GameId" = g."Id"
INNER JOIN "Platforms" AS p0 ON p."PlatformId" = p0."Id"
WHERE p."GameId" = @__request_GameId_0
ORDER BY p."Id" DESC

SELECT g."Id", g."Title", g."Publisher", g."ReleaseDate", g."ImageUrl", COALESCE((
    SELECT p."Price"
    FROM "PriceEntries" AS p

SELECT r.id AS "Id", r.content AS "Content", r.rating AS "Rating", r.createddate AS "CreatedDate", u."Email" AS "UserEmail"
FROM "Reviews" AS r

    SELECT p."Price"
    FROM "PriceEntries" AS p

SELECT f.id AS "Id", f.title AS "Title", f.createddate AS "CreatedDate", u."Email" AS "Author", (
    SELECT count(*)::int
    FROM "ForumReplies" AS f0
    WHERE f.id = f0."ForumPostId") AS "CommentCount"
FROM "ForumPosts" AS f
INNER JOIN "Users" AS u ON f.userid = u."Id"
WHERE f.forumcategoryid = @__categoryId_0
ORDER BY f.createddate DESC

SELECT g."Id", g."Title", g."Publisher", g."ReleaseDate", g."ImageUrl", COALESCE((
    SELECT p."Price"
    FROM "PriceEntries" AS p
    WHERE p."GameId" = g."Id"
    ORDER BY p."RecordingDate" DESC

FROM "Games" AS g

2025-12-30 03:18:26.340 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (35ms) [Parameters=[@__request_GameId_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT p."Id", p."Price", p."RecordingDate", p."GameId", g."Title" AS "GameName", p0."Name" AS "PlatformName"
FROM "PriceEntries" AS p
INNER JOIN "Games" AS g ON p."GameId" = g."Id"
INNER JOIN "Platforms" AS p0 ON p."PlatformId" = p0."Id"

SELECT g."Id", g."Title", g."Publisher", g."ReleaseDate", g."ImageUrl", COALESCE((
    SELECT p."Price"
    FROM "PriceEntries" AS p
    WHERE p."GameId" = g."Id"
    ORDER BY p."RecordingDate" DESC

FROM "PriceEntries" AS p

    FROM "PriceEntries" AS p
    WHERE p."GameId" = g."Id"
    ORDER BY p."RecordingDate" DESC
    LIMIT 1), 0.0) AS "Price"
FROM "Games" AS g
WHERE g."PlatformId" = @__targetPlatformId_0

    FROM "ForumReplies" AS f0
    WHERE f."Id" = f0."ForumPostId") AS "CommentCount"

SELECT p."Id", p."Price", p."RecordingDate", p."GameId", g."Title" AS "GameName", p0."Name" AS "PlatformName"
FROM "PriceEntries" AS p
INNER JOIN "Games" AS g ON p."GameId" = g."Id"
INNER JOIN "Platforms" AS p0 ON p."PlatformId" = p0."Id"
WHERE p."GameId" = @__request_GameId_0
ORDER BY p."Id" DESC

SELECT p."Id", p."Price", p."RecordingDate", p."GameId", g."Title" AS "GameName", p0."Name" AS "PlatformName"
FROM "PriceEntries" AS p
INNER JOIN "Games" AS g ON p."GameId" = g."Id"
INNER JOIN "Platforms" AS p0 ON p."PlatformId" = p0."Id"
WHERE p."GameId" = @__request_GameId_0
ORDER BY p."Id" DESC

INNER JOIN "Users" AS u ON r."UserId" = u."Id"
WHERE r."GameId" = @__gameId_0
